processing_speed.diagnosis: Reduced structural integrity in the Superior Longitudinal Fasciculus (SLF). Based on 50+ DTI connectomic studies.

rigidity.diagnosis: Orbitofrontal Cortex (OFC) update delay. Cross-verification of 10+ studies show rule-switching mechanism latency.

impulse_control.diagnosis: Inhibitory signaling decay in the Right Inferior Frontal Gyrus (rIFG). Meta-analysis shows 30% reduction in Stop-Signal efficiency.
